Sure, here's a suggested travel plan for your trip from Palm Springs to Texas, visiting three cities over seven days from March 13th to March 19th, 2022, with a budget of $8,100:

Day 1 - March 13, 2022:

* Departure from Palm Springs
	+ Self-driving or taking a taxi to the nearest airport (cost: ~$200-$400)
	+ Flight from Palm Springs to Houston (estimated cost: $500-$800)
* Arrival in Houston
	+ Self-driving or taking a taxi to your hotel (cost: ~$30-$60)
	+ Check-in at the hotel (cost: ~$150-$250 per night)
* Sightseeing and activities in Houston
	+ Visit the Space Center Houston ($29.95 per person)
	+ Take a stroll along the Buffalo Bayou Park ($0)

Day 2 - March 14, 2022:

* Sightseeing and activities in Houston
	+ Explore the Museum District ($0-$25 per person)
	+ Visit the Houston Zoo ($19.95 per person)

Day 3 - March 15, 2022:

* Departure from Houston to San Antonio
	+ Self-driving or taking a taxi to the Greyhound bus station (cost: ~$15-$30)
	+ Take a bus from Houston to San Antonio ($47.50 per person)
* Arrival in San Antonio
	+ Self-driving or taking a taxi to your hotel (cost: ~$20-$40)
	+ Check-in at the hotel (cost: ~$150-$250 per night)
* Sightseeing and activities in San Antonio
	+ Visit the Alamo ($0)
	+ Take a stroll along the River Walk ($0)

Day 4 - March 16, 2022:

* Sightseeing and activities in San Antonio
	+ Explore the Natural Bridge Caverns ($25.95 per person)
	+ Visit the San Antonio Zoo ($14.95 per person)

Day 5 - March 17, 2022:

* Departure from San Antonio to Austin
	+ Self-driving or taking a taxi to the Greyhound bus station (cost: ~$15-$30)
	+ Take a bus from San Antonio to Austin ($47.50 per person)
* Arrival in Austin
	+ Self-driving or taking a taxi to your hotel (cost: ~$20-$40)
	+ Check-in at the hotel (cost: ~$150-$250 per night)
* Sightseeing and activities in Austin
	+ Visit the Texas State Capitol ($0)
	+ Take a stroll along the Lady Bird Lake Hike and Bike Trail ($0)

Day 6 - March 18, 2022:

* Sightseeing and activities in Austin
	+ Explore the LBJ Presidential Library ($8.00 per person)
	+ Visit the Austin Zoo ($13.95 per person)

Day 7 - March 19, 2022:

* Departure from Austin to Dallas
	+ Self-driving or taking a taxi to the Greyhound bus station (cost: ~$15-$30)
	+ Take a bus from Austin to Dallas ($47.50 per person)
* Arrival in Dallas
	+ Self-driving or taking a taxi to your hotel (cost: ~$20-$40)
	+ Check-in at the hotel (cost: ~$150-$250 per night)
* Sightseeing and activities in Dallas
	+ Visit the Sixth Floor Museum at Dealey Plaza ($18.00 per person)
	+ Take a stroll along the Katy Trail ($0)

Total estimated cost: $3,602.45 - $5,702.45 (depending on transportation and accommodation costs). This leaves plenty of room in your budget for meals, souvenirs, and other expenses.

Please note that this is just a suggested itinerary and may need to be adjusted depending on the availability of flights, buses, and accommodations. It's always best to book in advance to ensure availability and the best prices.
